# Simple ROS Publisher and Subscriber

## Build Package
$ catkin_make

## Source Package
$ source ~/catkin_ws/devel/setup.bash  

## Must Start Master
$ roscore

## Run
$ rosrun ros_beginner_tutorial talker.py

Might have to make scripts executable
$ chmod +x *

$ rosrun ros_beginner_tutorial talker.py

Source: http://wiki.ros.org/ROS/Tutorials/WritingPublisherSubscriber%28python%29
Source: http://wiki.ros.org/ROS/Tutorials/CreatingPackage
